title: Grilled Chicken with Roast Garlic Sauce
ingredients: ['1 medium head garlic', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts', '125ml white wine', '30g butter', '250ml milk', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '4 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley']
